= Developer guides =

RepositoryStructure : a short overview of the project structure in the Passerelle repository.

PasserelleActorDevelopmentGuide : This guide presents an overview of the technological basis for the Passerelle actor model.
Then it describes the actor lifecycle, actor development APIs and types of actors. For each major actor type, a complete example is developed.
Finally, some advanced topics are discussed.

PasserelleUnitTestingGuide : Introducing the usage of Passerelle's test support tools, for unit-testing actors and simple flows.

= Links & References =

Some of the stuff used in Passerelle :

[http://ptolemy.berkeley.edu/ptolemyII/ Ptolemy II] : the platform for actor-based solutions for hybrid modeling in Java.

[http://www.osgi.org OSGi] : besides Ptolemy, the second most important element of Passerelle's software architecture

[http://www.eclipse.org eclipse] : our IDE and RCP platform

[http://eclipse.org/equinox/ eclipse's equinox] : the OSGi implementation on which Passerelle is based

[http://commons.apache.org/ Apache Commons] : Passerelle uses many libraries from Apache Commons, such as Collections, IO, HTTP Client, Lang, Net etc.

[http://www.jdom.org/ JDOM] : our preferred XML API

[http://www.slf4j.org/ SLF4J] : our preferred logging API
